Name: VE FPSO TOUR in VR
About the game: This is a guided tour on an FPSO or floating production storage and offloading. The user is transported from a high quality VR scene to a moving ship in the ocean, an immersive tour gives way to a small interactive scenario. Key Features. - Realistic FPSO Environment. - Includes 1 introduction scenario and 1 interactive scenario. - Get in the shoes of an offshore worker.
